name: Dino Reporter
description:
Based on Violet Detector

Controls:

Shoot with Z, Charge your camera with X, Switch colors with Space

Pressing X when camera is fully charged takes a picture

Arrow keys while taking a picture to move the reticle

Bullets in the picture get erased and enemies in the picture take damage

Bullets can weaken an enemy, but only a picture can deal the finishing blow

Themes:

Dinosaur Mafia, Parallel Worlds
